name: Jump Ball Max 2
description:
Jump Ball Max 2!!!
Exciting adventure of the bouncing ball through the helix tower labyrinth.
How to play
Control simply slide your fingers to the right and left to twist and jump the ball.
Try to avoid the red color twists and let the ball pass.
There are many levels with increasing difficulty levels.
Conquer height level using the skills that you can.
Explore many exciting levels helix jump
